title: Spanish Healing

description: Explore the best-selling and newly released spanish healing on Audible. New to Audible? Try Audible free.
cleaned_text: Spanish Healing - - Sanando la herida materna [Healing the Maternal Wound] - By: Aura Medina de Wit - Narrated by: Gabriela Ramírez - Length: 10 hrs and 35 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Si la respuesta a estas preguntas es afirmativa, sufres de una herida que va más allá de tu madre, tu abuela, e incluso de tu familia.
